title: Data-Driven Approach for Improving the Design of Mastery-Based Online Language Learning Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Language Proficiency and Management/Leadership Experience
context.additional_context: Learners master job-related language skills in simulation/VR environments and measure outcomes through project-based assessments. Digital devices are provided.

learning_goals: Learners can understand data-driven learning design and explain mastery-based module improvement strategies
Learners reduce language task completion time by 15% using self-regulated learning strategies in simulation/VR environments
Learners achieve an average performance improvement of over 10% in project-based assessments through improved module design
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
